mapper.select: SELECT t.title, t.price, t.product_name productName, t.work_date workDate, t.class_content classContent, m.member_id memberId, m.nickname, bi.main_image_name MPhoto, bi.image_folder_id folderName FROM Talent t LEFT JOIN BoardImage bi ON t.talent_id = bi.talent_id LEFT JOIN Member m ON m.member_id = t.member_id WHERE t.talent_id = ${talentId} AND bi.main_image_name IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OrderPay(member_id, product_name, final_price, quantity, tid) VALUES(#{partner_user_id}, #{item_name}, #{amount.total}, #{quantity}, #{tid})
